attributes.additional_details:
There is a distinct lack of respect in our country.
There are gangs of youths stabbing & killing each other.
There are drug gangs destroying our families with their poison.
Ethic divisions along religious lines are growing & tensions along with it.
The courts are inept & the police lack enthusiasm - probably due to the ineptitude of the courts.
National Service will help channel our youth & give them a common goal, a purpose & a reason to come together as one regardless of religion or ethnicity.
attributes.background:
National Service will bring discipline & respect back to our society.
It will bring people together regardless of religion or ethnic background.
There will there be no division by politics, sex, religion or ethnicity.
You are British, then you will serve & take pride in your country.
